plot: An explosive thrill ride of espionage between three different spies trying to acquire top secret documents. Things don't work out so well for two spies. Full of action, comedy and plot twists to keep you guessing and smiling all throughout.
title: Spy vs. Spy vs. Spy
plot_es: An explosive thrill ride of espionage between three different spies trying to acquire top secret documents. Things don't work out so well for two spies. Full of action, comedy and plot twists to keep you guessing and smiling all throughout.
